The Art of Striking

Learn from the best coaches in the world.

Our Gym

Point Blank Submissions is one of Ireland’s original Mixed Martial Arts and Brazilian Jiu Jitsu clubs, founded in 2002. It began as a training club affiliated to SBG under John Kavanagh based in NUIG, extending from the NUIG Taekwon-Do club. Its founding members included first generation Irish MMA fighters such as Mark Leonard, Vinny Connelly, Tom Haddock and Mark O’Toole. We moved to our first full-time premises in 2006 in the Parkmore Business Park where the club was run by Mark Leonard. In February 2011 Mark stepped aside and Tim Murphy took over as head coach. In May 2011 we moved to our new facility in the Glenrock Business Park in the Ballybane Industrial Estate.

Our purpose-built gym is close to local transport and has plenty of parking. A clean, modern facility, it features a large matted area, a weights area, and a competition size MMA cage. It has both male and female changing rooms and a shop so you can purchase any equipment that you need. We accept new members all the time so contact us to enquire about a free trial class.
